line.comment: * Mayhem.Monitor.Autopopulate.Ship handles 'mayhem_retreatSector' (it sets it to null if the composition is full).
* Look for another Outpost/sector if it doesn't exist anymore in $retreatSector or if none specified.
* If we are no longer leader, rejoin the squadron.

sval.val: Mayhem.Monitor.Autopopulate.Ship handles 'mayhem_retreatSector' (it sets it to null if the composition is full).
Look for another Outpost/sector if it doesn't exist anymore in $retreatSector or if none specified.
If we are no longer leader, rejoin the squadron.
